paper_abstract: Various aspects of computational physics education and various efforts at providing it. Also described modules, source and executeable codes, multimedia is in pdf and can be "read" with a variety of devices are discussed, including the need for it, its content is a new eTextBook that incorporates video lecture enhancements and extensive linkages. The first draft (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Making physics education more relevant and accessible via computation and eTextBooks
